titles.title: A bill to authorize extensions of time limitations in a FERC-issued license.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9248-9249)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 7/19/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon the request of a certain licensee, to extend the time required for commencement of construction of its project for a maximum of three consecutive two-year periods.
